entry.title: $1900 // ASTORIA ✦ NEW ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT ✦ ROOFTOP ACCESS ✦NW TR
entry.content:

entry.title: $2700 // ** LARGE 2.5 BEDROOM APARTMENT** **PARKING ON SITE** **NEXT TO SUBWAY*
entry.content:
** LARGE 2.5 BEDROOM APARTMENT** **PARKING ON SITE** **NEXT TO SUBWAY** **RENOVATED**

Listing ID #: 170379
Price: $2,700
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.5
Bathrooms: 1.0

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
Light
Marble Bath

Gut renovated apartment in the heart of Astoria Queens. Brand new hardwood floors, marble bathroom with large medicine cabinets, and a lot of storage space. Kitchen has brand new stainless steel appliances including dish washer! Bedrooms are large and 3rd room can be used as a home office or mini library. You will fall in love with this apartment! Parking on site available. This apartment is everything you need, close to subway, close to all cafe's and supermarkets for your convenience. A few blocks away from different gyms, banks, etc.

Neighborhood amenities: Cafe's - Bank of America - Citibank - Brunch spots - Gym - Subway walk -

For Viewing contact Imran Sajid. Cell: 917-412-5120. Email: isajid@BouklisGroup.com
